Posts.Content: lisa27 wrote: Hi all I had a bilateral mx with expanders for reconstruction on7 /9/08 and had the drains taken out 5 days later.  The hospital discharged Me with a  surgical bra .  The PS took out my drains,  pain pump and stitches 6 days later and put me back in the same surgical bra with removable pads covering drain holes and butterfly stitches. It is one week later and I find the bra to be so tight.  What have you worn during the expansion process? Bra sports bra? Cami? or nothing? I did not know why he kept me in such a tight bra? Is it to keep the swelling down? Keep the expanders in place? I am wondering what other people have done.  I am going back to the PS in two days but finding this bra to be so annoying. I would appreciate input. Thank you Elisa  Log in to post a reply
